data.name: See Light
data.detailed_description:
See Light - is a first-person story driven horror game. The main character – talented submarine engineer, who with a team of researchers will searching for the World War II sunken submarine, but the depths of the Black Sea keep all kind of secrets, and the expedition can turn into a disaster at any time.

Game features

  • Open World – explore the depths of the sea without limitation using different methods of movement;
  • Action – you will have to react fast and take actions immediately to keep up with dynamics of the game;
  • Horror - atmosphere and non-linear story will keep you in suspense until the end of the game;
  • Survival – use resources rationally to achieve your goals;
  • Graphics – you will find yourself at the bottom of the Black Sea due to the advanced technology of Unreal Engine 4.

data.short_description: See Light - is a first-person story driven horror game. The main character – talented submarine engineer, who with a team of researchers will searching for the World War II sunken submarine, but the depths of the Black Sea keep all kind of secrets, and the expedition can turn into a disaster at any time.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.5 GHz or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX470 / AMD HD 5870 (1GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible using the latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 / AMD R9 270X (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible using the latest drivers
